MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML11 and ML12 postcode areas of Biggar and Lanark. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified a ground overhead line near Cloburn Quarry and we now expect your supply to be restored by 8am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:24am on 8th November
